mapper.select: SELECT board_seq, type_seq, member_id, member_nick, title, content, has_file, hits, create_dtm, update_dtm FROM S_SungTaehyun.board WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND type_seq=2 ORDER BY board_seq desc LIMIT #{startPage}, #{pageSize};
select count(1) FROM S_SungTaehyun.board where type_seq=#{typeSeq};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_SungTaehyun.board (type_seq, member_id, member_nick, title, content, has_file, hits, create_dtm, update_dtm) VALUES(#{typeSeq}, #{memberId}, #{memberNick}, #{title}, #{content}, NULL, 0, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'));
mapper.select: SELECT type_seq, member_id, member_nick, title, content, has_file, board_seq, hits, create_dtm, update_dtm FROM S_SungTaehyun.board where board_seq = #{boardSeq} and type_seq = #{typeSeq};
mapper.update: UPDATE S_SungTaehyun.board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, update_dtm = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM S_SungTaehyun.board WHERE board_seq=#{boardSeq} AND type_seq=#{typeSeq};
DELETE FROM S_SungTaehyun.board_attach WHERE board_seq=#{boardSeq} AND type_seq=#{typeSeq};
